statements: UPDATE voice_command_history SET user_id = 'abc123', command_text = 'Play music' WHERE command_id = '12345';
UPDATE voice_command_history SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00', user_id = 'xyz789' WHERE command_text = 'Open the door';
UPDATE voice_command_history SET command_text = 'Turn on lights' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE voice_command_history SET command_text = 'New Command Text', timestamp = '2022-06-30 08:00:00' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND command_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-4h7i-8j9k-1l2m3n4o5p6q';

UPDATE voice_search_suggestions SET suggestion_text = 'Updated Suggestion Text', relevance_score = 7.8 WHERE suggestion_id = '9876fedc-ba98-7654-3210-abcdeffedcba' AND user_id = '345f6789-0abc-1234-def5-678901234567';
